name: The Scary Job
description:
As a new janitor hired by Fix & Clean Inc, you have been assigned to fix the problems of the old Ward mansion. Use your toolbox and flashlight to find and fix the problems, but try to not be scared by the former residents of this mansion...

CONTROLS

Move with WASD and try to find broken objects and fix then by staying close to it.
Avoid the Ghost: if your flashlight blinks and the your heartbeats increase, try to run to another area
